name: KIT109 - Exam Game (Tarnsky)
description:
Controls 

Click left mouse button to fire. Hold down for more power. Move the mouse to change the angle. The goal is to destroy the red enemy tank. You only have 10 shots per level so make them count!

Asset List

Free Sound Effects Pack – This is used for the pickup sound for the chocolate.

Olivier Girardot. (2019, 08 23). Free Sound Effects Pack. Retrieved from Unity Asset Store: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/free-sound-effects-pack-155...

Absolutely Free Music – This is used for the background music of the game.

Vertex Studio. (2015, 04 7 ). Absolutely Free Music. Retrieved from Unity Asset Store: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/music/absolutely-free-music-4883

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=otqueqkdm3g – angle calculation

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2BJyG54eP4w – power calculation

Features

Core

Projectile shooting, Projectile aiming, Projectile collisions, Projectile damage / enemy health, Ammo, Level completion / game over

Extra

Visual style and feel, Trail, Sound Effects, Music

User Interface

Title screen with level select, In-game UI, End of game text

Levels

Black Hole, Shield, Moving Bouncy Barriers, Minions, Reversed Gravity, Moving Enemy
